title: Walking Dead or Last of Us Zombies? - A Conversation with Colin
description:
In a zombie apocalypse, would you rather fight slow-moving or fast-moving monsters? Greg and Colin discuss their zombie-fighting plans.

Today's topic was submitted by ShutUpBender. Leave your suggestions for future conversations in the comments below.

SUBSCRIBE/LIKE/SHARE

Every Tuesday and Thursday, roommates Greg and Colin sit down, and Greg throws a random conversation topic at Colin. In return, Colin usually says something crazy and you get a chuckle. Subscribe so you don't miss the madness.
